description: A Good Pilot Is Always Learning
title: Private Pilot Podcast by MzeroA.com

episodes.title: VFR Flight Planning
episodes.description: What are some of Jason’s tips for planning a “Real World” VFR trip?

episodes.title: Flight Maneuvers
episodes.description: As a Private Pilot, what are some of the ways we can improve our flight maneuvers?

episodes.title: Slow Flight Down the Runway
episodes.description: The #1 way to improve your landings

episodes.title: Reading Charts
episodes.description: How do we, as Private Pilots, get better at reading charts?

episodes.title: Getting Ready for Instrument Flying
episodes.description: What can we do as a Private Pilot to get ready for our Instrument rating?

episodes.title: Mock Check Ride
episodes.description: What is the best way to prepare for a Private Pilot check ride?

episodes.title: Thunderstorm Flying
episodes.description: How can we learn more and understand Thunderstorm Flying?

episodes.title: A Deeper Dive into United Flight 173
episodes.description: If you enjoyed yesterday’s post on YouTube and Facebook, today on the Private Pilot Podcast, Jason takes a deeper look into the accident of United Flight 173 How does an airplane run out  of fuel in VFR conditions in sight of the airport?

episodes.title: Mock Check Ride
episodes.description: 5 actual Private Pilot check ride questions

episodes.title: Your First Passenger After Your Check Ride
episodes.description: What are some considerations for your first passenger after your check ride?

episodes.title: Improving Landings
episodes.description: What are some things you can do to improve your landings?

episodes.title: Staying Proficient
episodes.description: What are some ways to stay proficient as a Private Pilot?

episodes.title: Preparing for your Knowledge Test
episodes.description: What are some proven ways to help yourself prepare for the FAA written knowledge test?

episodes.title: FAASafety Wings Program
episodes.description: What can the FAASafey Wings Program do for me as a pilot and why should I be involved?

episodes.title: Fear of Flying
episodes.description: Have you ever been scared while flying? What are some ways we can recognize some of our fears in the cockpit and what can we do to work through them?

episodes.title: Emergency Procedures
episodes.description: How can we better prepare for the unexpected?

episodes.title: Wake Turbulance
episodes.description: You’re in a Cessna 172 and you’ve been cleared to land, Number 2 behind an Airbus A320. Now what?

episodes.title: Solo Practice
episodes.description: So you’ve soloed, now what? What are some best practices for newly soloed pilots to sharpen their skills?

episodes.title: The Lost Art of Flight Plans
episodes.description: Did you know we’re switching to ICAO flight plans this year?

episodes.title: Technology in the Cockpit
episodes.description: How do we as Private Pilots use technology to increase situational awareness?

episodes.title: Beyond your Private Pilot Certificate
episodes.description: What are some amazing things you can do with your Private Pilot Certificate?

episodes.title: What Great Private Pilots All Have in Common.
episodes.description: I found the common link that all successful, low time private pilots have in common.

episodes.title: The Truth About Senario Based Training
episodes.description: Often times we hear the phrase “Senario Based Training.” But, what does it mean for myself and my Private Pilot Certificate?

episodes.title: The Perfect Flight Lesson
episodes.description: What makes a perfect flight lesson? In this episode Jason will explain to you what he believes makes up the ultimate private pilot flight lesson.

episodes.title: What is a Runway Incursion?
episodes.description: The FAA considers a runway incursion any occurrence at an aerodrome involving the incorrect presence of an aircraft, vehicle or person. But what does this mean to me as a private pilot?

episodes.title: Getting the Most Out of Each Flight Lesson
episodes.description: Most students leave time and money on the table in regards to their flight training. In this weeks podcast, I’ll share with you how to get the most out of each flight lesson.

episodes.title: Flying at Night
episodes.description: In this weeks episode of the Private Pilot Podcast, Jason shares with you his tips for flying and navigating at night.

episodes.title: Required Preflight Action
episodes.description: In this episode, Jason dives into CFR 91.103 talking required pre-flight action for Private Pilots.

episodes.title: The Private Pilot Checkride
episodes.description: Jason and the MzeroA.com team have built an entire business around helping students pass their checkrides. Hear his best tips for preparing for your Private Pilot check ride.

episodes.title: 3 Ways to Improve Radio Communications
episodes.description: Learning proper ATC radio communications early on is crucial for success as a Private Pilot.

episodes.title: Cross Country Flighty Planning
episodes.description: In this episode Jason teaches you how he prepares days ahead for a VFR cross country flight.

episodes.title: Overcoming Plateau’s in Your Flight Training
episodes.description: In this episode Jason discusses how to overcome obstacles and roadblocks in your Private Pilot flight training.

episodes.title: Landings and the FAA Written Test
episodes.description: Listen in as Jason shares with you his secrets to perfect landings. Also hear about the most recent changes to the FAA Private Pilot written test.
